minipool_deposit_event.title: :rocket: Minipool Staked
minipool_deposit_event.description: Minipool %{minipool} has deposited to the Beacon Chain!

minipool_exited_event.title: :leaves: Minipool Exited
minipool_exited_event.description: Minipool %{minipool} has been flagged as Withdrawable!

odao_member_join.title: :new: oDAO Member Joined
odao_member_join.description: %{nodeAddress} joined the oDAO with a Bond of %{rplBondAmount} RPL!

rpl_inflation_event.title: :chart_with_upwards_trend: RPL Inflation Occurred
rpl_inflation_event.description: %{value} new RPL minted! The new Total Supply is %{total_supply} RPL.

milestone_rpl_stake.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_rpl_stake.description: Over %{milestone_value} RPL has been staked by Node Operators! (%{result_value} RPL)

milestone_reth_supply.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_reth_supply.description: Over %{milestone_value} rETH has been issued! (%{result_value} rETH)

milestone_staking_minipools.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_staking_minipools.description: Over %{milestone_value} Minipools are currently staking on the Beacon Chain! (%{result_value} Minipools)

milestone_rpl_swapped.title: :tada: Milestone Reached
milestone_rpl_swapped.description: Over %{milestone_value}% of all RPL has been exchanged for the new Version! (%{result_value}%)

bootstrap_odao_member.title: :satellite_orbital: oDAO Bootstrap Mode: Member Added
bootstrap_odao_member.description: %{nodeAddress} added as a new oDAO Member!

bootstrap_odao_disable.title: :satellite_orbital: oDAO Bootstrap Mode: Disabled Bootstrap Mode
bootstrap_odao_disable.description: Bootstrap mode for the oDAO has been disabled!

bootstrap_pdao_multi.title: :satellite_orbital: pDAO Bootstrap Mode: Multiple Settings Modified

bootstrap_pdao_claimer.title: :satellite_orbital: pDAO Bootstrap Mode: Changed Reward Distribution
bootstrap_pdao_claimer.description: Contract `%{contractName}` has been allocated %{perc}% of the Inflation!

bootstrap_pdao_disable.title: :satellite_orbital: pDAO Bootstrap Mode: Disabled Bootstrap Mode
bootstrap_pdao_disable.description: Bootstrap mode for the pDAO has been disabled!
